attributes.comment:
I received notification that you are considering price increases re: adoption. I do
not know what the reasons are for the increase but I ask you to reconsider.
Adoption is very expensive, we estimate it will be at least $25,000 to adopt a little
boy from Vietnam. I can't understand why it costs so much money, I would think
that getting a loving home for a child is worth much more than a person making a
huge profit off adoption. Please consider what the price increases could do, more
loving couples would not be able to give a child a home because it will be too
expensive.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Janine Olsen
